title: Sick children and workplace accommodation
content:
Scenario: Sick children and workplace accommodation
    Given children get sick frequently
    And Sarah needs to care for sick children
    When Tommy or Emma is sick
    Then the workplace_elohim should help Sarah navigate work accommodations
    And it should recognize parent's obligation to care for sick child
    And it should support requesting necessary time off
    And the system should validate that child care is priority
    And workplace should accommodate parent responsibilities
    And Sarah should not face professional penalty for parenting obligations
